I have invested a lot of money and 80 hours in this game. It is fun, except for the fact I cannot play it anymore. Upon going to my library, it says purchase. I have purchased it, and I have proof I have not refunded because I have 80 FUCKING hours. How the fuck does this even happen. I am goddamned pissed off that I cannot play this anymore cause the game is FUCKING AMAZING! It is one of the most fun and competitive games I have played to date, but the key aspect is I could actually FUCKING play it. I do not care if it is BHVR's fault or steams fault, but I will NOT change this review until the game gets it's MOTHERFUCKING SHIT together. Either fix the game, or refund me EVERY SINGLE ACCURSED CENT I have poured into your game so I can buy it again and actually play it. UPDATE: They fixed it.

It would be great if I could actually play. I bought the game downloaded it and played just fine for awhile, then all of a sudden in my library it was telling me to purchase the game I looked at it and it said I already owned it then I opened the game in the files it loaded and then told me my steam was offline when it was very clearly online I want to recommend it but I cant if I cant even play because of something stupid. My buddy can still play it but one of my other buddies has the same problem. If you want people to enjoy things and buy more games from you then let them play and enjoy it, just fix your problems i dont know what the problem is but I should be able to play the game that I paid for. Fix your Tuesday maintenance crap.
un muy buen juego lo recomiendo esta genial

Recomiendo Dead by Daylight porque puedes jugar un montón de partidas rápidas escogiendo dos papeles: "survivor" o "killer". Esto te permite experimentar los diversos mapas desde diferente forma y aprovechar sus ventajas según el rol que hayas elegido. Existen varios DLC que puedes adquirir en la tienda Steam, en este caso recomiendo las ofertas para hacerte de varios al mismo tiempo o bien revisar diversas paginas en la web para comprar el contenido mas adecuado y donde obtengas personajes con buen "tier". Adicionalmente me hizo apreciar el genero de terror puesto que encuentras varios personajes como "Michael Myers", "Piramid Head", "The Pig", "Freddy Krueger", etc. De igual manera pasas horas divertidas jugando en equipo de amigos.
